title: Looking for an Old Judge Nicol & Reilly...
author: seablaster

posts.post_title: Looking for an Old Judge Nicol & Reilly...
posts.post_content:
Being a tall drink of water myself, I have an appreciation for this card.  I haven't come across one I've really liked though.

Should you have one you're willing to part with, please send me a PM.  Thank you.

You just missed a tattered card on ebay

[url]http://www.ebay.com/itm/1888-Old-Judge-Cigarette-Factory-Nicol-Reilly-Long-and-Short-Cin-/271050535953?pt=US_Baseball&hash=item3f1bdef411[/url]
Hey Fred.  I saw that one, but as you mentioned, it has some condition issues.  :(

I'm glad you didn't like it :)

Good luck with the hunt.

Thanks Matt.  I was considering it, but my luck with "place holder" cards hasn't been too good in the past.  I'm glad I didn't run you up in the auction though.  Be sure to return the favor in the future.  ;)
